attributes.action: let children only through from calais, not full grown men!
attributes.additional_details: Provide us the UK with full details (ages etc) of each refugee.                                          Anyone over the age of 17 send them back and bring back a child.                                        Use dental exemination (like the other 16 eu countries have) to determine the age of each person.
attributes.background: So I am all for letting in child refugees from the calais camp, thry need somewhere safe. What we dont want is adult men coming through when its suppose to be children only! They are taking places of children that really need our help, and who knows what there here for, sneaking into our country.
